title: Strengthening Curriculum Development Practical Skills: Computer-Supported Collaborative Learning Design Tool Competency Course

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can utilize two computer-assisted tools to design collaborative learning scenarios within six months.
Learners can implement Computer-Supported Collaborative Learning (CSCL) designs in mobile environments with over 80% accuracy aligned to specific language education objectives.
Learners can select learning design tools compatible with existing ICT platforms for practical application in real-world tasks.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
